The tweet in question was published in T: Tweet of the Day' section on June 26, 2018, suggesting that it was a genuine tweet from Warren Buffett.
The Twitter handle associated with the t: ORACLEofETH, was not the official account of Warren Buffett.
The admin of the: ORACLEofETH account confirmed that it was a parody account in response to a tweet by a social media user.
The official Twitter account of Warren B: WarrenBuffett, which has not been active since April 2016, indicating that the tweet in question did not come from his verified account.
